author: wrowe
msg: Fix the close-on-sendfile bug where Win32 would transmit a single
sendfile bucket and then lose it's socket, and fix a comment.

author: aaron
msg: Placing the thread-limit and server-limit values, those which define the
size of internal structures in the scoreboard, actually into the
scoreboard allow third-party applications to access those structures.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'v1_0'.
